songs.title: LEGEND IN MY HOOD
songs.lyrics:
Snippet

[Verse]
Tryna take my life and they took my guys
So we forever shedding blood
I'm just spending my nights, running all my life
Them niggas never understood
Nigga, fuck the fame, get it on my name

[Chorus]
When I die, young legend in my hood
Young nigga, I'm a legend in my hood
Young nigga, I'm a legend in my hood
